name: LO: Transmission
description:
A Game born out of Global Game Jam 2018 at Level up Inc.
Made by Jaydon Teh, William Cheong

[GGJ 2018]
https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/lo-transmission
you can also use a game pad / game controller to play this game.  Directional buttons are for movement. "A" key to hack, "B" key to go invisible.  Hint: Try ram the enemy. O.o :P
